remarks: The ` Z/nZ ` structure is a totally ordered set.  (The order is not respected by the operations, except in the case ` N = 0 ` when it coincides with the ordering on ` ZZ ` .)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.)
statement:
zntos.y $e |- Y = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
zntos $p |- ( N e. NN0 -> Y e. Toset ) $.
